meta.title: AI Implementation Playbook - What Actually Works
meta.purpose: Distilled lessons from real implementations - shareable with clients

current_state.adoption: 88% of organizations use AI in at least one function
current_state.failure_rate: 95% of AI pilots fail to deliver ROI

why_most_fail: Vague 'AI transformation' scope without clear use cases
Built by consultants who don't understand the problem
Isolated demos that don't connect to real systems
No guardrails - hallucinations, errors, no escalation paths
Big-bang deployment instead of phased rollout
why_some_succeed: Built by people who understand the problem
Incremental phases - prove value before expanding

architecture_pattern.name: Multi-Agent with Intelligent Routing
architecture_pattern.description: Not one AI for everything - route to the right model for the right task

tiers.use_for: Quick lookups, simple FAQ, order status
Complex reasoning, root cause, edge cases

architecture_pattern.benefit: 80% of requests handled by cheap models, expensive models only when needed

integration_pattern.name: Tool Use, Not Just Retrieval
integration_pattern.description: AI that DOES things, not just answers questions
examples: Don't tell me warranty status - LOOK IT UP from Shopify
Don't describe troubleshooting - WALK THROUGH IT step by step
Don't explain how to create RMA - DRAFT IT and notify ops

guardrails_pattern.name: Gatekeeper Layer
guardrails_pattern.description: Every AI response passes through validation before reaching users
checks: PII protection - no customer data leaked
Hallucination detection - claims must be verifiable
Human escalation - automatic handoff on failure

maximize_automation_preserve_relationshi.goal: Automate 100% of what CAN be automated
maximize_automation_preserve_relationshi.philosophy: Not 'keep humans in everything' - it's 'automate everything automatable, humans for what matters'
what_humans_handle: When AI is uncertain and escalates
maximize_automation_preserve_relationshi.target: As high automation rate as possible while preserving relationships that matter
maximize_automation_preserve_relationshi.result: 5-10x team capacity - team focuses on high-value interactions, not repetitive tasks

for_people: Work on higher-impact things for the company
Learn to work WITH AI systems, not be replaced by them
Co-build and improve the AI platforms they use
Manage and oversee AI systems (new skill set)
Move to other areas of business they enjoy more
More interesting work, less repetitive tasks
for_company: Fewer new hires needed as you scale (not layoffs, reduced hiring)
Existing team becomes more valuable (AI + human hybrid skills)
Institutional knowledge captured in systems, not just heads
Faster onboarding - AI assists new team members
long_term_benefits.the_shift: From 'doing tasks' to 'building and managing systems that do tasks'

integration_over_isolation.description: AI connected to actual business systems, not sitting in a silo
integration_over_isolation.anti_pattern: ChatGPT window open next to 5 other apps, copy-pasting
integration_over_isolation.pattern: AI pulls from and pushes to the systems where work happens

learning_over_static.mechanism: Track what works, feed insights back into prompts
learning_over_static.result: 2nd analysis in an industry is better than 1st, 10th is significantly better

proven_use_cases.goal: Automate everything automatable - order status, FAQ, known issues, triage
proven_use_cases.human_preserved: Key accounts, complex escalations, relationship moments

proven_use_cases.outcome: 5-10x team capacity, minutes vs hours response time

avoid_these.why: No clear use case, no success criteria, endless scope creep

avoid_these.anti_pattern: Custom internal AI builds from scratch
avoid_these.why: Use vendor solutions with integrations instead - 2x success rate

ready: Support automation with vendor platforms (Intercom Fin, Zendesk AI)
emerging: Custom ops tools built with AI coding assistants

2026_coming.technical_bar_collapse: Non-developers can build production apps that connect to real business systems
enabling_tools: Claude Code - natural language to working integrations
MCP (Model Context Protocol) - standardized tool connectivity
Make.com / n8n with AI - visual automation
platform_native_ai: HubSpot AI agents with full CRM integration

must_have: Executive sponsor who understands the use case
